title: Islamic Relief
subtitle:
Over 650,000 #Syrian #refugees are now thought be now living in #Jordan. 

Nearly half are children, and of these 40% are estimated to be out of school. We are working towards ensuring more children have access to local and safe spaces to learn: https://www.islamic-relief.org/fuelling-the-futures-of-hundreds-of-jordanian-and-refugee-children/ …pic.twitter.com/CcHTli5Okb
